attributes.action: Stop increasing fuel and household bill prices as its making it hard to live
attributes.additional_details: Because its hard to live financially stable and with the increasing pricing for fuel and other bills its making people have no money and causing depression
attributes.background: Lower fuel prices, stop upping tax prices and make sure people can live financially stable. Lower the fuel pricing.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government aren't responsible for setting fuel prices or other household bills. 

You might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089

We could accept a petition calling for lower taxes if you explained which taxes you'd like to be reduced.
